name: Simple Samurai Game
description:
I've started doing a Game Design Course at Uni this year and this is the very first thing I have made in it.

Sorry there's no sound, I haven't learnt that yet.

It just get's straight into it.

ESC to restart.

Defeat the Boss Samurai to Win.

The scripts are fairly simple, I'm still very early in learning, but any suggestions are welcome. This is just super janky at the moment. I'm going to look at changing it as I keep working on it over the next Trimester.

I think I've chosen the right genre for where it is up to at this stage.
